パッケージ jp.summit_tech.controller

クラス RegistController

Object
BaseController
RegistController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/regist")
public class RegistController
extends BaseController
Controller for the page to input user-account

    修飾子とタイプ メソッド 説明

    Generate new UserForm, and set them on the page.

    Register user-account data, and go back to the login page.

  • コンストラクタの詳細

    • RegistController

      public RegistController()

  • メソッドの詳細

    • init

      @ModelAttribute public UserForm init()
      Get new UserForm.
      戻り値:
      New UserForm

    • doGet

      @RequestMapping(method=GET) public ModelAndView doGet()
      Generate new UserForm, and set them on the page.
      戻り値:
      ModelAndView for registration in initial state (not null)

    • doPost

      @RequestMapping(method=POST) public ModelAndView doPost​(@Valid @ModelAttribute @Valid UserForm userForm, BindingResult br)
      Register user-account data, and go back to the login page.
      パラメータ:
      userForm - Form to post one user (not null)
      br - For validation (not null)
      戻り値:
      ModelAndView for going to login page (not null)
